body.p: Enclosed please find petition, by granting same you will greatly oblige as you will see some of our most respectable citizens join in petition. You know most of the particulars as you were here at the time difficulty occurred and doubtless heard them Beleiving therefore you will grant it

I remain
Your obt Servt
J A Tomlinson
